org.asl.karelx

Class Uberbot

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.fcps.karel2.Item
      • edu.fcps.karel2.Robot
        • org.asl.karelx.Uberbot
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Squarebot, Teleporter, Wanderer

    public class Uberbot
extends edu.fcps.karel2.Robot
    An Uberbot is a Robot with advanced capabilities.
    Author:
    Kent Collins, December 2014

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Uberbot()
      Create an instance at (1, 1) facing North with an infinite supply of beepers.
